OBCQL_WIDGET_QUERY.HQL: select posapp.name as pos, org.name as store,posapp.id as posid, org.id as orgid, p.name as product, p.id as prodid,pc.name as family, pc.id as prodcatid, count(o.id) as numtransac, sum(sol.orderedQuantity) as quantity, round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*(sol.grossListPrice-sol.grossUnitPrice)),2) as totaldiscount, case when round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*(sol.grossListPrice-sol.grossUnitPrice)),2) = 0 then 0 else ( case when sum(sol.grossListPrice) = 0 then 100 else round((sum(sol.grossListPrice-sol.grossUnitPrice)/sum(sol.grossListPrice))*100,2) end ) end as totaldiscpercentage, round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice),2) as totalsales, round(sum(tc.cost),2) as totalcost, round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice-tc.cost),2) as grossmargin, round((sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice-tc.cost)/sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice))*100,2) as grossmarginpercentage from TransactionCost as tc join tc.inventoryTransaction as t right join t.goodsShipmentLine as iol left join iol.salesOrderLine as sol left join sol.product as p left join p.productCategory as pc left join sol.salesOrder as o left join o.obposApplications as posapp left join o.organization as org where o.salesTransaction = 'Y' and o.documentStatus = 'CO' and posapp.client.id=:client and posapp.organization.id IN (:organizationList) and o.creationDate>to_date(:datefrom,'YYYY-MM-DD') and o.creationDate<to_date(:dateto,'YYYY-MM-DD') and @optional_filters@ group by posapp.name,org.name,posapp.id, org.id,p.name, p.id,pc.name, pc.id order by totalsales desc, quantity desc, posapp.name, p.name, pc.name

select org.name as store, org.id as orgid, u.id as salesmanid, u.name as salesmanname, sum(sol.orderedQuantity) as quantity, round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*(sol.grossListPrice-sol.grossUnitPrice)),2) as totaldiscount, case when round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*(sol.grossListPrice-sol.grossUnitPrice)),2) = 0 then 0 else ( case when sum(sol.grossListPrice) = 0 then 100 else round((sum(sol.grossListPrice-sol.grossUnitPrice)/sum(sol.grossListPrice))*100,2) end ) end as totaldiscpercentage, round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice),2) as totalsales, round(sum(tc.cost),2) as totalcost, case when round(sum(tc.cost),2)>0 then round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice)/(sum(tc.cost)),2) else NULL end as markup, round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice-tc.cost),2) as grossmargin, round((sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice-tc.cost)/sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice))*100,2) as grossmarginpercentage from TransactionCost as tc join tc.inventoryTransaction as t right join t.goodsShipmentLine as iol left join iol.salesOrderLine as sol left join sol.product as p left join sol.salesOrder as o left join o.salesRepresentative as u left join p.productCategory as pc left join o.obposApplications as posapp left join o.organization as org where o.salesTransaction = 'Y' and o.documentStatus = 'CO' and posapp.client.id=:client and posapp.organization.id IN (:organizationList) and o.creationDate>to_date(:datefrom,'YYYY-MM-DD') and o.creationDate<to_date(:dateto,'YYYY-MM-DD') and @optional_filters@ group by org.name, org.id, u.name, u.id order by totalsales desc, quantity desc, org.name, u.name

select bp.id as bpid , bp.name as bpname,bp.searchKey as bpsearchkey,us.email as email,us.phone as phone, us.alternativePhone as alternativePhone,us.fax as fax,us.firstName as firstName, us.lastName as lastName from BusinessPartner bp, ADUser us where bp.client.id=:client and bp.organization.id IN (:organizationList) and bp.id=us.businessPartner.id and bp.customer='Y' and @optional_filters@ order by us.firstName,us.lastName

select org.name as store, org.id as orgid, sum(sol.orderedQuantity) as quantity, round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*(sol.grossListPrice-sol.grossUnitPrice)),2) as totaldiscount, case when round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*(sol.grossListPrice-sol.grossUnitPrice)),2) = 0 then 0 else ( case when sum(sol.grossListPrice) = 0 then 100 else round((sum(sol.grossListPrice-sol.grossUnitPrice)/sum(sol.grossListPrice))*100,2) end ) end as totaldiscpercentage, round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice),2) as totalsales, round(sum(tc.cost),2) as totalcost, case when round(sum(tc.cost),2)>0 then round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice)/(sum(tc.cost)),2) else NULL end as markup, round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice-tc.cost),2) as grossmargin, round((sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice-tc.cost)/sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice))*100,2) as grossmarginpercentage from TransactionCost as tc join tc.inventoryTransaction as t right join t.goodsShipmentLine as iol left join iol.salesOrderLine as sol left join sol.salesOrder as o left join o.obposApplications as posapp left join o.organization as org where o.salesTransaction = 'Y' and o.documentStatus = 'CO' and posapp.client.id=:client and posapp.organization.id IN (:organizationList) and to_date(to_char(o.creationDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')>=to_date(:datefrom,'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(to_char(o.creationDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')<=to_date(:dateto,'YYYY-MM-DD') and @optional_filters@ group by org.name, org.id order by totalsales desc, quantity desc, org.name

select org.name as store, org.id as orgid, bp.id as cusid, bp.name as cusname, sum(sol.orderedQuantity) as quantity, round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*(sol.grossListPrice-sol.grossUnitPrice)),2) as totaldiscount, case when round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*(sol.grossListPrice-sol.grossUnitPrice)),2) = 0 then 0 else ( case when sum(sol.grossListPrice) = 0 then 100 else round((sum(sol.grossListPrice-sol.grossUnitPrice)/sum(sol.grossListPrice))*100,2) end ) end as totaldiscpercentage, round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice),2) as totalsales, round(sum(tc.cost),2) as totalcost, case when round(sum(tc.cost),2)>0 then round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice)/(sum(tc.cost)),2) else NULL end as markup, round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice- tc.cost),2) as grossmargin, round((sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice- tc.cost)/sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice))*100,2) as grossmarginpercentage from TransactionCost as tc join tc.inventoryTransaction as t right join t.goodsShipmentLine as iol left join iol.salesOrderLine as sol left join sol.product as p left join sol.salesOrder as o left join o.businessPartner as bp left join p.productCategory as pc left join o.obposApplications as posapp left join o.organization as org where o.salesTransaction = 'Y' and o.documentStatus = 'CO' and posapp.client.id=:client and posapp.organization.id IN (:organizationList) and o.creationDate>to_date(:datefrom,'YYYY-MM-DD') and o.creationDate<to_date(:dateto,'YYYY-MM-DD') and @optional_filters@ group by org.name, org.id, bp.name, bp.id order by totalsales desc, quantity desc, org.name, bp.name

select org.name as store, org.id as orgid, p.id as prodid, p.name as prodname, sum(sol.orderedQuantity) as quantity, round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*(sol.grossListPrice-sol.grossUnitPrice)),2) as totaldiscount, case when round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*(sol.grossListPrice-sol.grossUnitPrice)),2) = 0 then 0 else ( case when sum(sol.grossListPrice) = 0 then 100 else round((sum(sol.grossListPrice-sol.grossUnitPrice)/sum(sol.grossListPrice))*100,2) end ) end as totaldiscpercentage, round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice),2) as totalsales, round(sum(tc.cost),2) as totalcost, case when round(sum(tc.cost),2)>0 then round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice)/(sum(tc.cost)),2) else NULL end as markup, round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice- tc.cost),2) as grossmargin, round((sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice- tc.cost)/sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice))*100,2) as grossmarginpercentage from TransactionCost as tc join tc.inventoryTransaction as t right join t.goodsShipmentLine as iol left join iol.salesOrderLine as sol left join sol.product as p left join sol.salesOrder as o left join p.productCategory as pc left join o.obposApplications as posapp left join o.organization as org where o.salesTransaction = 'Y' and o.documentStatus = 'CO' and posapp.client.id=:client and posapp.organization.id IN (:organizationList) and o.creationDate>to_date(:datefrom,'YYYY-MM-DD') and o.creationDate<to_date(:dateto,'YYYY-MM-DD') and @optional_filters@ group by org.name, org.id, p.name, p.id order by totalsales desc, quantity desc, org.name, p.name

select org.name as store, org.id as orgid, pc.id as familyid, pc.name as family, sum(sol.orderedQuantity) as quantity, round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*(sol.grossListPrice-sol.grossUnitPrice)),2) as totaldiscount, case when round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*(sol.grossListPrice-sol.grossUnitPrice)),2) = 0 then 0 else ( case when sum(sol.grossListPrice) = 0 then 100 else round((sum(sol.grossListPrice-sol.grossUnitPrice)/sum(sol.grossListPrice))*100,2) end ) end as totaldiscpercentage, round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice),2) as totalsales, round(sum(tc.cost),2) as totalcost, case when round(sum(tc.cost),2)>0 then round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice)/(sum(tc.cost)),2) else NULL end as markup, round(sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice- tc.cost),2) as grossmargin, round((sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice- tc.cost)/sum(sol.orderedQuantity*sol.grossUnitPrice))*100,2) as grossmarginpercentage from TransactionCost as tc join tc.inventoryTransaction as t right join t.goodsShipmentLine as iol left join iol.salesOrderLine as sol left join sol.product as p left join sol.salesOrder as o left join p.productCategory as pc left join o.obposApplications as posapp left join o.organization as org where posapp.client.id=:client and posapp.organization.id IN (:organizationList) and o.salesTransaction = 'Y' and o.documentStatus = 'CO' and o.creationDate>to_date(:datefrom,'YYYY-MM-DD') and o.creationDate<to_date(:dateto,'YYYY-MM-DD') and @optional_filters@ group by org.name, org.id, pc.name, pc.id order by totalsales desc, quantity desc, org.name, pc.name

select pos.name as posname,org.name as store, org.id as orgid,pos.id as posid, prod.name as prodname,prod.id as prodid, to_char(ord.creationDate, 'YYYY') as year,to_char(ord.creationDate, 'MM') as month, sum(ordl.orderedQuantity) as quantity from Order ord,OrderLine ordl,Product prod,OBPOS_Applications pos, Organization org where pos.client.id=:client and pos.organization.id IN (:organizationList) and pos.id = ord.obposApplications and ord.organization=org.id and ordl.salesOrder=ord.id and prod.id=ordl.product and ord.salesTransaction='Y' and ord.documentStatus='CO' and @optional_filters@ group by pos.name, org.name,pos.id, org.id,prod.name,prod.id,to_char(ord.creationDate, 'YYYY'),to_char(ord.creationDate, 'MM') order by to_char(ord.creationDate, 'YYYY'),to_char(ord.creationDate, 'MM')
